notes.summary: Shell baseline config describing OS role, modular apps, and theme engine integration points.
guidance: Apps must not mix their internal logic with OS shell code.
Each app exports into LionGateOS/apps/<AppName>/ as a self-contained module.
Theme packs share icons, wallpapers, and palettes across OS and apps.
Style modes remain an internal OS-level framework.
